root.name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six 3: Iron Wrath
root.description: Iron is the second expansion pack for the popular PC title Rainbow Six 3: Raven Shield. It was in production for 2 years, before Ubisoft released it as a free to download to Fileplanet subscribers on the 9th June, 2005. The expansion features a new 7 mission campaign, 2 classic missions, 8 new multiplayer maps, and 6 new weapons.
